attributes.action: Biometric cards for people who has pre or settled status
attributes.additional_details: To finish with the problems that european people are having crossing the borders. A biometric card would let them to enhance their right to entry and facilitate border officials work
attributes.background: To approve a biometric cards for people who has pre or settled status

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572353
